faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our AI Collage Generator

q1.question: What image formats are supported?
q1.answer: We support all common image formats including JPG, JPEG, PNG, and WEBP. For best results, we recommend using high-quality images with at least 1080px width. The maximum file size is 10MB per image.

q2.question: How long does AI background removal take?
q2.answer: The entire process typically takes around 90 seconds. This includes uploading your image, AI processing to remove the background, creating the 3D grid layout, and generating your final collage. You'll see a real-time progress bar during processing.

q3.question: What's the daily generation limit?
q3.answer: You can generate up to 5 collages per day for free. The quota resets every 24 hours at midnight. Important: Adjusting parameters (scale, position) after generation does NOT consume your quota ‚Äî only clicking "Generate" uses one quota slot.

q4.question: Can I use the generated images for commercial purposes?
q4.answer: Yes! All generated collages are yours to use freely for both personal and commercial purposes. However, please ensure you have the rights to use the original photos you upload. We don't claim ownership of your images or generated collages.

q5.question: What resolution is the final output?
q5.answer: The final collage is generated at 1080√ó1440 pixels (3:4 aspect ratio), which is the optimal size for Instagram posts, Facebook stories, and TikTok videos. This ensures your collage looks crisp and professional on all social media platforms.

q6.question: Do I need all 9 grid photos?
q6.answer: No, you can start with fewer photos. While 9 photos create the fullest grid effect, you can generate collages with any number of grid photos from 1 to 9. Empty slots will simply remain blank, giving you more creative flexibility.

q7.question: What makes this different from other collage makers?
q7.answer: Unlike manual tools, we offer AI-powered background removal in 90 seconds, stunning 3D pop-out effects, and real-time parameter adjustments without consuming your quota. No Photoshop or design skills needed ‚Äî just upload and create!

q8.question: Is my data safe and private?
q8.answer: Absolutely. Your uploaded images are processed securely and are not stored on our servers after processing. All data is handled with encryption. We respect your privacy and do not share your images with third parties.

Perfect for creating Instagram grid posts, TikTok videos, Facebook stories, and other social media content. Our advanced AI technology automatically removes backgrounds from your photos in seconds, creating professional-looking collages with a beautiful 3D pop-out effect. No Photoshop or design skills needed ‚Äî just upload your photos and let our AI do the work. Generate up to 5 free collages per day, with unlimited parameter adjustments to get the perfect look for your social media posts.

meta.title: About AI Collage Generator | Free 3D Photo Collage Maker
meta.description: Learn about AI Collage Generator - a free online tool for creating 3D photo collages with AI background removal. Our mission, technology, and how we help creators worldwide.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.content: AI Collage Generator is a free online tool that helps you create stunning 3D photo collages with the power of artificial intelligence. Our platform combines advanced image processing with an intuitive interface to make professional-quality collages accessible to everyone.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.intro: Simply upload your images and let our AI do the magic:
howItWorks.step1: Upload 9 grid images to create a beautiful background
howItWorks.step2: Upload 1 main image that will be the focus of your collage
howItWorks.step3: Our AI removes the background from your main image
howItWorks.step4: Adjust parameters like scale, position, blur, and brightness
howItWorks.step5: Download your stunning 3D collage in high quality

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.content: We believe that everyone should have access to professional-grade photo editing tools. Our mission is to democratize creative content creation by providing free, easy-to-use AI-powered tools that produce exceptional results.

technology.title: Technology
technology.content: Our platform leverages cutting-edge AI technology for background removal and advanced image processing algorithms to create depth and visual interest. All processing is done securely, and we don't store your images on our servers.

contact.title: Contact Us

q3.answer: We support all common image formats including JPG, PNG, and WebP.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: AI Collage Generator is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our service.

imagesYouUpload.content: When you use our service, you upload images for processing. These images are processed to create your collage and are not permanently stored on our servers. Images are temporarily cached during processing and automatically deleted after the session ends.

usageInformation.intro: We may collect anonymous usage statistics including:

imageStorageAndProcessing.item4: Not used for training AI models
